sentences: Oled sa saatsinud tänaseks oma last kooli?
Ta saatsid mind kindlustama, et olen hästi.
Kas sa saatsid selle meile juba eelmisel nädalal?
context: 'saatsid' is the second person singular past tense of 'saata', which means to send. It can refer to sending a message, an email, or even a person somewhere.
